description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical/ r indicates a repetition trial
the order of the two conditions
target point in the occluded condition
target point in the absent condition
point during motivational control trial to the visible object in the occluded condition
point during motivational control trial to the visible object in the absent condition
unspecified (not specified which of the two referents was intended) point to the middle of the locations in the occluded condition
unspecified (not specified which of the two referents was intended) point to the middle of the locations in the absent condition
distractor point to the location with irrelevant material in the occluded condition
distractor point to the location with irrelevant material in the absent condition
the phase during the test in which a target point occurred in the occluded condition
the phase during the test in which a target point occurred in the absent condition
the latency (in sec) it took to a target point in the occluded condition
the latency (in sec) it took to a target point in the absent condition
